description:
Is GAY FACE real? https://youtu.be/n6JJyrX1u44?si=NAxazRhjR2LcQewI
There is a lot of new research on the 'gay accent' or 'gay voice' - and why it might be that gay men and gay women speak differently than hetero people

Written by: Gregory Brown & Mitchell Moffit
Edited by: Luka Sarlija
Drawn by: Gregory Brown

References and Further Reading

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7497419/

https://www.jstor.org/stable/455948

https://web.archive.org/web/20071101043238/http://www.newsandevents.utoronto.ca/bin2/020218c.asp

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gay_male_speech

https://www.rowdymagazine.com/post/why-do-gay-men-sound-like-~that~
title: Can you tell if someone is gay from their voice?
